评论详情: Great skirt - love the fit but not as breathable as I thought it would be.
I bought this for my granddaughter and she absolutely loves them.  The fit is as expected and the fabric has such a great feel.  I will definitely be buying another pair and a pair for myself.

I love this - It provides the modesty I want but doesn’t look dowdy.  As a 60ish woman I feel comfortable wearing these for outdoor exercise as well as doing errands afterwards. They’re comfortable, wash well and slimming.
Excellent quality, length and fit!! Nothing less then expected from the Snoga brand!
If you’re looking for skirt with pants.  I recommend this style

Great fit and good coverage. I’m am at Disney World this week and wore this my first say. I loved it so much that I rinsed it out in the hotel sink so I could wear it another day.  Feels light and stretches just right.

I love snoga! The only issue I have with cropped leggings is my height. At 5’10” the leggings do not fall at the right place and because of this they are too tight around my calves. I still wear them, but it’s something that bothers me.
It was a perfect fit! It is great to use when I go running. I feel comfortable wearing it.
Love your skirts! I’m an active mom of 2 toddlers and this brand is great for modest and feminine active wear.
It’s very nice and modest. Exactly what I was looking for. They run a size small
Awesome athletic skirt and very comfortable.
My wife loves the yoga pants/.
Love it. True size. Very comfortable
I bought this on their store site but love that they are on amazon since I can use a gift card to buy another one!! @snoga add more products please !!

评论概述: Fits nicely but only one side scrunches
评论详情: The skirt and leggings fit well. The only problem was one side of the skirt strings was sewn onto the skirt so the strings cannot since the skirt up on one side. The other works beautifully allowing it to have a scrunched look. I will have to alter it myself which is a bummer. Poor job on final Inspection.
I loved this snoga! The material is so comfortable! Definitely worth it! It’s so stretchy . Looks cute with anything! Wish they had more colors one here tho
